commit message: Use locale defined month/date format. e.g. in Germany, this is dd.MM., in Australia DD/MM.
Only create the SimpleDateFormat when recomputing

Merge pull request #177 from muro/master

Use locale defined month/date format. e.g. in Germany, this is dd.MM.

When adding multiple pictures, use both getData and getClipData. Some ContentProviders (e.g. Google Photos) use both and reading only getData ignores multiple images. This is extra annoying when the pictures are downloaded first.
Use set instead of list to avoid duplicate first entry in getClipData and getData
